title: AE插件：字体效果快速预览管理工具 Aescrips Font Previewer v1.0 Win
author: 大众脸
content: 该插件可帮助用户在 After Effects 中直观预览字体样式，无需实际应用即可查看效果。支持通过文件夹管理字体，并可通过双击快速切换字符面板中的当前字体。特别适用于频繁更换字体时的高效工作流程。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6, CS5.5, CS5

other.description_en: Font Previewer plugin allows you to preview fonts, manage them by folders and change the current font in After Effects ‘Character’ panel just by double-clicking.
